name: Lead, Dead and Bloodshed
description:
Lead, Dead & Bloodshed is a top down, survival shooter.  Each wave of zombies will be bigger and can bring different enemies. The aim is to stay alive as long as possible by killing zombies, but keep a close eye on your ammo because you run out before you know it. Throughout the map different buildings and ammo stashes are hidden. But don't stay in a building for too long, trust me, you can't hide for ever.

This game is the result of a small game jam I held with a friend.
I'm planning to expand on it in the future and maybe even implement  a dungeon crawler type game mode.

Controls:

movement: WASD
Weapon change: 123
Shoot: leftmouse
Aim: Cursor location
Pause: Esc
